mapper.insert: insert into info_street (id, area_id, code, name, create_user, create_time, create_ip, update_user, update_time, update_ip, status, ts, district_gb_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{districtGbCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, area_id, code, name, create_user, create_time, create_ip, update_user, update_time, update_ip, status, ts, district_gb_code from info_street where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
